thread.title_full: Point A hotel Paddington - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: JosephineHansen
title: Point A hotel Paddington
text: Had a great stay at the hotel. Easy to get to/from and nice staff. Room was fine - very small, but had what we needed. Only problem is the noise / light at night. If people arrive late / leave early you can hear them very clearly (even if they're just talking). And the door doesn't close completely so there's a lot of light from the hallway coming trough the door. However I had brought a sleep mask and ear plugs so it wasn't much of a problem to me.
